list.name: United Nations Security Council (UNSC)
list.agenda: Discussing the current state of affairs of the Israel-Hamas War

list.name: United Nations Human Rights Council (UNHRC)
list.agenda: Addressing the human rights crisis in Myanmar after the military coup of 2021

list.name: North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO)
list.agenda: Addressing Russian activity in Ukraine and its wider impact on Europe

list.name: Disarmament and International Security Council (DISEC)
list.agenda: Discussing the proliferation of arms in the Middle East with special reference to the involvement of non-state actors

list.name: United Nations Environmental Programme (UNEP)
list.agenda: Discussing avenues to address marine pollution in South-East Asia

list.name: Social, Humanitarian and Cultural Committee (SOCHUM)
list.agenda: Addressing the situation pertaining to the use of illegal human labour with special emphasis on Asia-Pacific-based and South Asian Nations

list.name: Continuous Crisis Committee (CCC)
list.agenda: Beginning of operation "Rolling Thunder" [Freeze date - March 8, 1965]

list.name: International Press Corps
list.agenda: To report on contemporary geopolitics while representing different viewpoints
